name: create-eth-ts-dapp
description: A template for building Full-Stack Blockchain Dapps using Next.js (React), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Hardhat, Solidity, and many more!
author: Adrian Delgado

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./hardhat && npx hardhat node" "cd ./frontend && npm run dev" "cd ./backend && yarn dev"
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && yarn install && cd ../frontend && yarn install && cd ../hardhat && yarn install
